translations.translation: We will ease you to the Easy Way.
We shall take you slowly towards ease.
We shall ease you to follow the way of Ease.
We shall make all your tasks easy.
And We shall create the means of ease for you.
And We shall make easy for you the easy.
And We will make your way smooth to a state of ease.
We shall ease thee unto the Easing.
And We shall ease thy way unto the state of ease.
We shall facilitate for you the Easy Way.
And We shall make easy Unto thee the easy way.
And We shall ease you into facility.
And We will make it easy for thee (to follow) the simple (Path).
And We shall make easy for you (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) the easy way (i.e. the doing of righteous deeds).
We shall ease you to the easy.
We will ease you into the Easy Way.
And We will ease you toward ease.
[87:8] And We will ease your way to the easy way, the uncomplicated Law, namely, Islam.
(And We shall ease thy way unto the state of ease) We shall make easy for you the conveyance of the message and all other acts of obedience.

commentaries.author: ابن عربي
commentaries.text: { ونيسرك لليسرى } أي: نوفقك للطريقة اليسرى أي: الشريعة السمحة السهلة التي هي أيسر الطرق إلى الله وهو عطف على سنقرئك أي: نكملك بالكمال العلمي والعملي التام وفوق التام الذي هو التكميل وهي الحكمة البالغة والقدرة الكاملة

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } اعلم يا أكمل الرسل أنَّا بمقتضى عظيم جودنا معك { نُيَسِّرُكَ } ونوفقك على التدين والتحفظ بمقتضيات الوحي { لِلْيُسْرَىٰ } [الأعلى: 8] أي: للطريقة السلهة السمحة البيضاء
